import api from'../api/axios';export const adminService={// Dashboard stats
async getStats(){const response=await api.get('/admin/stats');return response.data;},// User management
async getUsers(){let skip=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:100;let search=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;const params=new URLSearchParams();params.append('skip',skip.toString());params.append('limit',limit.toString());if(search)params.append('search',search);const response=await api.get("/admin/users?".concat(params.toString()));return response.data;},async getRecentUsers(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:5;const response=await api.get("/admin/users/recent?limit=".concat(limit));return response.data;},async updateUser(userId,data){const response=await api.put("/admin/users/".concat(userId),data);return response.data;},async deleteUser(userId){const response=await api.delete("/admin/users/".concat(userId));return response.data;},// Order management
async getOrders(){let skip=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:100;let status=arguments.length>2?arguments[2]:undefined;const params=new URLSearchParams();params.append('skip',skip.toString());params.append('limit',limit.toString());if(status)params.append('status',status);const response=await api.get("/admin/orders?".concat(params.toString()));return response.data;},async getRecentOrders(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:10;const response=await api.get("/admin/orders/recent?limit=".concat(limit));return response.data;},async updateOrderStatus(orderId,status){const response=await api.put("/admin/orders/".concat(orderId,"/status"),{status});return response.data;},async confirmPayment(orderId){const response=await api.post("/admin/orders/".concat(orderId,"/confirm-payment"),{});return response.data;}};
